All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Cancellable
public class LapisMessageEvent extends net.lapismc.lapiscore.events.LapisCoreCancellableEvent
This event is fired when a player sends a private message to another player on the server

  • Constructor Details

    • LapisMessageEvent

      public LapisMessageEvent (UUID sender, UUID receiver, String message, String format)
      Parameters:
      sender - The sender of the message
      receiver - The recipient of the message
      message - The message content
      format - The format being used for displaying in chat

  • Method Details

    • getSender

      public UUID getSender()
      Returns:
      Returns the UUID for the player who has sent the message

    • getReceiver

      public UUID getReceiver()
      Returns:
      Returns the UUID for the player who has sent the message

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Returns:
      The raw message being sent by the player, this has no formatting tags

    • applyFormat

      public void applyFormat (String placeholder, String value)
      Applies a format to a formatting tag
      Parameters:
      placeholder - The tag you wish to replace
      value - The value that should be used in place of the tag

    • getFormat

      public String getFormat()
      Returns:
      Returns the current format, This will not be the final format sent to players
